DOC.brief_summary: Background : High- low-flux dialysis membrane make different material may correlate various hemodynamic tolerance profile . This study aim investigate hemodynamic response incidence hypotensive episode compare commonly use high- low-flux dialyzer . Methodology : The study design open label , randomize , cross-over investigation , include 25 patient undergoing chronic hemodialysis . Four polysulfone dialyzer 1.8 m2 , A ( Revaclear , Gambro ) , B ( Helixone high flux , Fresenius ) , C ( Xevonta , BBraun ) D ( Helixone low flux , Fresenius ) , compare . The hemodynamic profile assess non-invasive technique patient ask provide tolerance feedback questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: age 18 old ability understand information present sign inform consent chronic hemodialysis least 8 week stable dialysis prescription modality 2 week prior protocol implementation mental illness ; inability understand information present sign informed consent ; acute disease require hospitalization time patient enrolment pregnancy breast feeding
